text: Bamsı'yı bir kere daha görmek istiyorsan, o kılıcı
english: If you want to see Bamsu one more time, it's the sword.
Put it in your sheath, Mr. Ertugrul.
Sir, as ordered, I was at Hanlı Market.
Blood in the inn took the body away again.

text: Ertuğrul Bey ve Emir Hazretleri bir olup
english: Mr. Ertugrul and His Excellency will be united
Does Emir Sadeddin break the peace?
They say it's because of Hatun.

text: Sonra Alpler, Vasilius ve komutanını götürdüler
english: Then the Alps took Vasilius and his commander.
How did Vasilius get out of your hands?

text: Bamsı Alp'i rehin almış derler beyim
english: They say he's taken Bamsik Alp hostage, sir.
You're out of my hands this time, Bamsi.
You're the survivor, Vasilius. You're the survivor.

text: Ne oldu? Var mı bir haber?

english: Emir Sadaddin is going to Konya, sir.
He's on his way with his soldiers.

text: Konya'ya mı gidecekmiş? Beni görmeden mi?
english: Is he going to Konya or not to see me?

text: büyük bir toy kurulacak bu gece
english: A great young man will be made tonight
All the Turkishmen will come to the inn
They can't all go to the inn.
They won't be able to enter the inn alive.

text: Hadi kardeşler, getirin Aman dikkat edin
english: Come on, brothers, bring it. Be careful.
Why don't you go and let them take a look at your wounds?
I'll talk to you after I'm young.

text: bu toprakların uç beyliğini layık gördüğün Ural'a
english: To Ural, whom you claim to be the master of this land.

text: Sen bu sitemleri bana edeceğine kendine edesin Ural Bey
english: Don't worry about me, Mr. Ural.

text: "Ben ne kadar ahmağım, ne kadar basiretsizim ki
english: "How stupid I am, how shortsighted I am
Despite the support of the great Emir Sadeddin
I've lost the mastery of flight."
We found his body on the side of the road.
They say he fell off a horse and died, sir.

text: Bu işin içinde de o var
Kendine itimat eden beyleri otağında topladığını bilirim beyim
english: I know you've got your confidence gentlemen in your bed, sir.

text: Sonra onu bir daha gören olmadı
english: And then no one ever saw him again.
I don't have a choice, Aslihan.

text: Biz onu durdurmazsak her gün bir cana daha kıyacak
english: If we don't stop him, he'll kill another person every day.
Unsub Ural's murder is a means to an end.

text: Cehennemin dibine de gitse elimden kurtulamaz
english: He can't get out of my hands if he goes to hell.
Mr. Ural, Kutluca will call you.

text: Tez gidin beyim. Ben onları oyalarım
english: Go quickly, sir, I'll hold them off.

text: Anlaşılan en müsait vakit gece yarısıdır
english: Looks like midnight's the best time.
But how do we know who's who?

text: Vasilius’un en kıymetli ve rütbeli komutanları…
english: Vasilius' most valued and senior commanders...

text: …her gece ona malumat vermek için yanına gelir
english: Every night she comes to give him information.

text: İç kaleye doğru giren komutan görürseniz bilin ki onlardır
english: If you see the commander entering the inner castle, it's them.

text: Haçaturyan ile Dumrul da size destek olsun
english: Crossaturyan and Dumrul will support you.
You will take the lives of those commanders.

text: Cesetlerini de Vasilius’un gözünün önüne asasınız
english: And hang their bodies in front of Vasilius.
I've spoken to Helena. She's with us.

text: Türkmen beylerini öldürenin de Vasilius olduğunu söyledi
english: He said it was Vasilius who killed the Turkmen gentlemen.

text: Bundan en ufak bir şüphemiz yoktu zaten
english: We had no doubt about it.

text: Biz de buraya bunun bedelini ödetmek için geldik
english: So we came here to make him pay.
They took our strollers, Master Crusader.
They won't let anyone else into the castle.

text: Korkuları başlarına vurdu Lakin çok geç kaldılar
english: Their fears struck them, but they were too late.

text: Görürüm ki acımasız askerler yetiştirirsin Tekfur Vasilius
english: I see you raise ruthless soldiers, Taekfur Vasilius
If you agree, we'd like to be your guests.

text: Bilirsin, Türklere kapım her zaman açıktır
english: You know, I'm always welcome to the Turks.

text: Şarabı fazla kaçırıp kendinden geçmezsin umarım
english: I hope you don't drink too much wine and pass out.
Well, our commander-in-chief is getting married.

text: Bugün sarhoş olmayacağız da ne vakit olacağız?
english: When are we gonna get drunk today?

text: O halde kendine şimdiden seni taşıyacak birini bul
english: Then find yourself someone to carry you now.

text: Ne oldu ihtiyar, ne bu hâl?
Yenge, ne oldu? Bir haber var mı?
O kız, Ural'ın sağ kolu olan Acar Bey'in kızıdır
english: She's the daughter of Mr. Acar, Ural's right-hand man.
We'll shoot the enemy in his own nest.
There is no revenge against the Turk
In this land, there will be no end to the persecution.

text: bu topraklarda ilahi nizam her yere yayılacak
english: In this land, the divine order will spread everywhere.
Close the doors, cover the exits!

text: Bu kaleden kimse çıkamayacak anlaşıldı mı?
english: No one gets out of this castle, all right?
All right, come on, break it up!
He's in his room and he's safe, sir.

english: Put a soldier on his door, and you'll protect him with your life!
They come in packs, Turgut Alphead.
The wolves get their share of the herd.

english: Please, God, help them, they won't get away!

They hit me in the head!

text: Bu taraftan kaçtılar, tam bu taraftan kaçtılar!
english: They ran this way, they ran this way!

text: Bu taraftan kaçtılar asker tam bu taraftan!
english: They ran this way, soldier, right this way!

text: Ee, ne diye vurursun o kapıya be? Orada değiller ki
english: Well, why the hell would you knock on that door?
What do you do there, soldier?
I told you they went this way.
It's because we've seen you back on our feet.

text: İnşallah yiğitlerimiz de kazasız belasız muzaffer olarak geri dönerler
english: May our braves return victorious without incident.

text: Dönemeseler de vazifelerini ifa etmeden şehit olmayacaklardır
english: They won't be martyrs until they've done their duty.

text: bundan çok daha beterlerinden sağ salim kurtulmuşlardın evelallah
english: You've survived much worse than this, God willing.

text: Hepsi de helal süt emmiş yiğitlerdir
english: They're all brave men who've been milked by good milk.
With them is the help of Allah.
We're out of the trouble of Ural, sir.

text: Bu kadar emin olmayasın Aliyar Bey
english: Don't be so sure, Mr. Aliyar.

text: Onun kolay pes etmeyeceğini sen benden daha iyi bilirsin
english: You know better than me that he won't give up easily.
The Emir has withdrawn Sadaddin's support from him.

text: Ural'ın Vasilius'dan medet umacağını düşünmek dahi istemem
english: I don't want to think that Ural would ever turn to Vasilius.

text: Bir insan nasıl bu kadar alçalır beyim?
english: How can a man stoop so low, my lord?

text: Makamı elde edemediklerinde hırsları gözlerini öyle bir kör eder ki
english: When they don't have the office, their ambition blinds their eyes.

text: düşmanın kucağı, onlara arzu ettikleri makamları gibi gelir
english: The enemy's lap is like the places they want them to be.

text: Allah sizi gözü dönmüşlerin şerrinden korusun
english: And Allah protects you from the evil of those who are astray.

text: Allah'ın rızasından daha üstün olmadığını unutmayasınız
english: Do not forget that you are not superior to God's approval.

text: Bizden dualarını eksik etmeyesin Hayme Ana
english: Don't fail us in your prayers, Mother Hayme.
Is there a sign, Mr. Aliyar?

text: Beyim, Ural Bey'in peşine giden Alplerimiz döndü
english: Sir, the Alps who went after Mr. Ural have returned.

text: Allah bize şehitlerimizin intikamını almayı nasip etti çok şükür
english: God has blessed us with vengeance for our martyrs.

text: Ben sizinle mi topraklarımızı geri alacağım?
english: Do I get our land back with you?

text: Sizinle mi devletimizin şanını yücelteceğim ha?
english: You want me to glorify the glory of our government with you?
When the Turks enter into the castle, our commanders
How could you let him kill you?
How could you let this happen?

text: Nasıl oldu bu iş o zaman?
Ertuğrul, ölen beylerinin intikamını almaya gelecek demedim mi?
english: Didn't I say Ertugrul would come to avenge his dead men?

text: Gözünüzü dört açın demedim mi, ha?
english: Didn't I tell you to keep your eyes open, huh?

text: Böyle bir baskını beklemiyorduk Tekfur Vasilius
english: We didn't expect such a raid, Tekfur Vasilius
This was a public suicide attack.
The Alps are very loyal to Ertuğrul
They blacked out to become martyrs.
Your work is very difficult Vasilius.

text: Mutlaka bu kalenin içinde iş birlikçileri vardır
english: There must be collaborators inside this castle.
He took my oba away from me.

text: Şimdi de senin kalene göz koydu
english: Now he's got his eye on your castle.
To hell with all of you!
I'll kill you with my bare hands!
May the Lord accept your testimony, brave men.

text: kıyan bir insandan daha zalim kim olabilir Ertuğrul Bey?
english: Who is more cruel than a man who kills, Mr. Ertugrul?

text: İktidar olma hırsı insanın gözünü öyle bir kör eder ki
english: The ambition of power blinds one's eyes.
Traitors drink the enemy's poisonous sherbet

text: Göğsünden de, sırtından da yara almış
english: Wounded in the chest and back.

text: Bu tek başına Ural'ın işi değil
Belli ki ona yardım eden bir hain var Ertuğrul Bey
english: There's obviously a traitor who's helping him, Mr. Ertugrul.
Let's talk to the Alps who brought the martyrs.

text: Evvela içimizdeki hainleri bir bir temizlememiz gerek
english: First, we need to get rid of the traitors inside of us.

text: küffarla cihada girmek, bize ancak yıkım getirir
english: Blasphemy is the only thing that can bring us destruction.
Why did you kill the Alps?

text: İmdi bir de bununla mı uğraşacağız?
english: And now we have to deal with this?
I have no choice, my lord.
Whatever I did, I couldn't turn it around.

text: Bir iz, bir delil bırakmadınız inşallah
english: I hope you didn't leave any trace, any evidence.

text: Beyim, Aliyar Bey bizi görmek ister
english: Sir, Mr. Aliyar would like to see us.
The walls are dangerous, be careful!
Sir, we've been ordered to protect you.
We'll be right outside your door.
What's going on in the yard?
I can't give you any more information, sir.
You can't get your revenge without me.

text: Obamdaki beyler harekete geçmek için işaretimi beklerler
english: The men in my Obama wait for my signal to make their move.
They're all ready for a riot.
The killers are still in the castle, sir.

text: Tüm giriş çıkışları tuttuk Kurtulmaları mümkün değil
english: We've got all the entrances and exits covered. There's no way they'll survive.
I'll get them off the stake and hang them on the walls!

text: Nikea'dan gelecek mühimmatlardan haber var mı?
english: Any word on the ammunition from Nikea?
He'll be at the castle the day after tomorrow, sir.
Tell Teo the situation has changed.
Let him take precautions with his men.

text: Efendim, en iyi adamlarımız koruyor içiniz rahat olsun
english: Sir, our best men are protecting you, so rest assured.

text: Sana ne diyorsam onu yap komutan!
english: Do as I tell you, Commander!

text: O mühimmatları almak için kendi mabeyincimizi
english: To get those ammunition, our own master.
I had to kill him, you idiot!

text: O mühimmatlar Türklerle olan savaşımızı kazanmamızı sağlayacak
english: Those ammunitions will help us win our war with the Turks.

text: Başlarına bir şey gelirse hepinizi yakarım
english: If anything happens to them, I'll burn you all.
There's gonna be a lot of trouble out there.

text: bütün surları adım başı askerler çevirmiş
english: Every wall has been turned one foot at a time.

text: kalenin tüm giriş ve çıkışları kapalı
english: All entrances and exits of the castle are blocked.
You're still worried about the body, Master!
And through the gate of the castle
We can't escape their walls anymore.
If we don't get out of this castle quickly
They'll be looking all over the place.

text: Nasıl çıkacağız bu uğursuz kaleden Turgut Alpbaşım?
english: How do we get out of this evil castle, Turtle Alphead?

text: Ölene kadar beş on tanesini götürürüz
english: We'll take five or ten of them till they die.
When Mr. Ertugrul conquered the castle
Don't you want to be with him?

text: Bize bu yolu gösterecek tek kişi de Helena'dır
english: Helena is the only one who can show us the way.
We need to get to him.
Okay, but how do we get to Helena?

text: Pusatların açamadığı kilidi benim anahtarım açar
english: My key unlocks what the pusats can't.

text: Ee, fetihte benim de katkım olsun
english: Well, let me contribute to the conquest.
Ural poisoned the braves of my oba.

text: Şimdi düştüğümüz duruma bak Ertuğrul Bey!
english: Look at the state we're in now, Mr. Ertugrul!

text: İhanetin girmediği yer yoktur Aliyar Bey'im
english: There's no place without betrayal, Mr. Aliyar.

text: Mühim olan bunu fark edip tedbir almaktır
english: The important thing is to realize that and take precautions.
How did it happen, Yasiz Alp?

text: Ural Bey'le Çolpan Hatun'un izlerini bulduk beyim
english: We found traces of Mr. Ural and Cholpan Hatun, sir.

text: Daha iyi iz sürebilmek için ikiye ayrıldık
english: We split up so we could track it better.

text: Sonra onları da kaybettiğimizi fark ettik
english: Then we realized we'd lost them, too.
They were all killed when we found them.

text: hem göğsünden hem sırtından nasıl yaralar?
english: How can he hurt his chest and back?
I've told you all I know, sir.
There's a trail of other people.

text: ya da bir emare gördünüz mü?
english: Or have you seen any signs?

text: Sizin diyeceğiniz bir şey yok mudur?
english: Don't you have anything to say?
What he said is true, my lord.
It's about to start with the oily alp.

text: Ural'a yakın olan Alplerden gözümüzü ayırmayalım
english: Let's keep an eye on the Alps near Ural.

text: Obanın içindeki hainlere bizi ulaştıracak olan o Alplerdir
english: It's the Alps that will lead us to the traitors inside the Oban.
Send an Alps to the Oba.

text: Yarın sabah Çavdar Obası'nda iki obanın beyleri toy yapacağız
english: Tomorrow morning, we're going to make the gentlemen of the two obans naive in the Rye Room.
And keep an eye on the fattened Alps.

text: Bakalım bu ittifak ne kadar sürecek?
english: Let's see how long this alliance lasts.
What's the status at the castle?

text: İyidir iyi, iyi. Her şey yolunda
english: It's okay, it's okay, it's okay.

text: Vasilius nasıl bir belaya bulaştığını daha yeni anladı
english: Vasilius just figured out what kind of trouble he's in.
Vasilius is our enemy, don't forget.

text: Bak, Emir Sadeddin'e güvendin, seni sattı
english: Look, you trusted Emir Sadeddin, he sold you out.

text: Vasilius'un Ertuğrul'la işi bittiğinde ilk seni öldürecektir
english: When Vasilius is finished with Ertugrul, he will kill you first.

text: Bu defa her şey farklı olacak
english: Everything's gonna be different this time.

text: o soysuz kefereyi kendi ellerimle geberteceğim
english: I'll kill that degenerate shroud myself.

text: Öyle kolay bir ölüm de olmayacak
english: And it won't be an easy death.
I'll take it, I'll take it

text: Sizin hayırlı iş de yarım kaldı kızım
english: Your good work is unfinished, my daughter.
But I can count on it.
What are you going to do now, Aslıhan Hatun?
After you're married, you're going to immigrate to Iconia?
I'd like to find peace, Mother.

text: Nerede huzurlu olacaksam orada yaşamak isterim
english: I want to live where I can rest

text: Gayrı bundan sonra ne kadar huzur bulurum bilmem
english: I don't know how much peace I'll find from now on.

text: Hoş gördük hatun Vaziyet nedir oğul?
Çakalın dişine kan değdi bir kere ana
english: The coyote's tooth was touched by blood.

text: Çavdar Obası'nda da, Kayı Obası'nda da
english: In the Rye Oba, in the Abyssin Oba
And the genius in the Hanlı Market
Well, what do you think, son?
Aliyar Bey and I discussed it.
We'll move it to the Rye Obama.

text: Kilimleri Frenklere teslim etmeye az kaldı beyim
english: We're about to deliver the rugs to the Franks, sir.

text: Bu taşıma işi bizi biraz yavaşlatacak
english: This whole moving thing is gonna slow us down a little bit.

text: Lakin ne edelim, ahval bunu gerektirir
english: But what can we do? That's what it takes.
We'll raise them together, God willing.

text: Böylece iki obanın hatunları da emniyette olur
english: That way the chicks of both the obans will be safe.

text: Bu birlikteliği obalarımızla kurmamız icap eder
english: We need to build this union with our obas.
Let's set it up in the Rye Obama.

text: dost düşman nasıl ittifak kurulurmuş görsün
english: Let the friendly enemy see how the alliance is formed.

text: Çavdar Obası'nın da nasıl emin bir yurt olduğu anlaşılsın
english: Let it be understood how safe the Rye Obama is.
Why do you want to see it?
I need to talk to him.
If you say Master Alvin is here
But what I have to say is very important.
He's got a lot of things he wants to do about the wedding.
If he hears you're stalling me
Soldier, take care of the merchant

text: Bu Helana Hatun güvenilir biri midir Turgut?
english: Is this Helena Hatun reliable, Turgut?
In fact, he's the only one we can trust in the castle.

text: O da bizim gibi Vasilius'un şerrinden nasibini almıştır
english: He's had his share of the evils of Vasilius, just like us.

text: İnşallah Haçaturyan eline gözüne bulaştırmadan buraya getirebilir
english: Let's hope the Crusader can get here before he messes up.
So, what you want from me for the wedding?

text: E bizi biraz yalnız bıraksan anlamaz mısın?
english: Can't you just leave us alone for a minute?
The measures have been increased since yesterday

text: Senden düğünle ilgili bir şey istediğimi hatırlamıyorum
english: I don't remember asking you to do anything about the wedding.
I need you to come to the store with me right now.

text: Hadi beni görmedin, koca küfeyi de mi görmedin?
english: Come on, you didn't see me, you didn't see the big box?
We'll take care of it. What is it?
What's the matter with Mr. Ertugrul?
So it was you who killed the commanders?

text: Sen de mi Ertuğrul Bey'in adamısın?
english: Are you Mr. Ertugrul's man too?

text: Bu uğursuz kalede artık kendimi emniyette hissedebilirim
english: I can feel safe in this evil castle now.
Come on, find them for me.
Break it up, break it up
But they're looking for you everywhere.
There are things you should know.

text: Babamı da onun öldürttüğüne artık eminim
english: Now I'm sure he had my father killed.
He doesn't put your father's blood on the floor.
Mr. Ural is in the castle.

text: Demek gelip o ite sığındı, ha?
english: So he came and took refuge with that dog, huh?

text: Teo adında bir meczubu peşine salmış
english: He sent a lunatic named Teo after him.

text: Dün gece o adamdan bahsettiklerini işittim
english: I heard them talking about that guy last night.

text: Yarın Nikea'dan büyük bir kervan gelecekmiş
english: There's a big caravan coming from Nikea tomorrow.

text: Türklere karşı savaşı kazandıracak mühimmatlar var içinde
english: There's ammunition in there that'll win the war against the Turks.
He's tasked the security measures to increase

text: Bir an önce kaleden çıkmamız lazım
english: We need to get out of the castle as soon as possible.
Come on, this way Come on, don't stop
Vasilius has declared war on you.

text: Babamın vasiyetini de, imparatorumuzun emrini de çiğnedi
english: He violated my father's will and our emperor's orders.
I'll help you get out of the castle.

text: Bu kolçakları Gündoğdu abim hediye etmişti
english: This armband was a gift from my brother at sunrise.
I beat him at arm wrestling.

text: O vakitten belliydi bileğinin kuvvetli olacağı
english: That's when you knew your wrist would be strong.

text: Gündoğdu abimi, Sungur Tekin abimi özledim
english: It's dawn. I miss my brother, Sungur Tekin.
Though our paths may be parted
Aliyar Bey and I became brothers

text: Lakin kendi kardeşlerimiz ne haldedir bilmeyiz abi
english: But we don't know what our own brothers are like.
We'll live here. We'll live here.
Sometimes I think about it, brother.
How would it have been if we hadn't split up?
We wouldn't give the enemy a hard time.
We'd give strength to our strength

text: Lakin onlar arkada kalmayı tercih ettiler
english: But they chose to stay behind.
Let's put it in the corner Aslıhan Hatun

text: Gayrı yarından itibaren bizler de buraya gelip sizlerle birlikte çalışacağız
english: From tomorrow on, we'll come here and work with you.
All you have to do is make a sound.
He wants to conquer the castle from the inside
It's not in vain to approach Mother Hayme
Tell me the situation as soon as possible.
Or else the castle will be lost.
I thought I'd stop by, ma'am.
Mind your own business, old man.
What do you mean, mind your own business?

text: Hadi bana güzel bir malumat ver de içim ferahlasın

You're not a washer. You're a doer.
You're not a forgetter. You're a reminder.

There's a problem. Is it in order?
The traitors who killed our commanders.

We're going to raid Ural first.

text: Haber Vasilius'la Ural'ın kulağına gidene dek
english: Until word reached Vasilius and Ural,
We'll be done with the raid.
So we don't hunt when we go hunting.

When we say, "Let's put the Alps together,"

text: Biz hepimiz evlatların nasıl birbirine bağlı olduklarını biliriz
english: We all know how connected children are.
I brought you buttermilk, Hayme Ana.
Thank you, Sunshine Chick, I don't want one.

text: elinizi öpüp yamacınızda hizmet etmek isterim
english: I'd like to kiss your hand and serve on your side

text: Benim her daim senin gibi çalışkan hatunlara ihtiyacım vardır
english: I've always needed hard-working chicks like you.
He's my assistant from day to day.
That's how it's supposed to be known.
All right, let's get back to work.
Once upon a time it was mine

text: Babam Türk göçebelerin sürüleri için otlakların kullanılmasına müsaade etti
english: My father allowed the pasture to be used for Turkish nomads' herds

text: Bunun için de imparator tarafından öldürüldü
english: And for that, he was killed by the emperor.

text: İnfazı için kaleye gelen askerlerin başında baban vardı
english: Your father was in charge of the soldiers who came to the castle for his execution.

text: Sakın bunun için onu suçladığımı düşünmeyesin
english: Don't think I blame him for that.

text: Senin kaleye ilk geldiğin günü hatırlarım
english: I remember when you first came to the castle.
You were a little girl, you were sweet.

text: Senin gibi bir evladım olmasını dilemiştim içimden
english: I wished I had a son like you

text: İmparatorluğun içinde çürümüş ne varsa bizi de zehirledi Helena
english: Whatever rotted inside the Empire poisoned us, Helena.
I'll definitely come to your church wedding.
I know you're worried about what happened in the training room.

text: abin bin bir türlü belayla uğraşır
english: Your brother's in a lot of trouble.

text: O ister ki bütün Alpler kardeş olsun
english: He wants all the Alps to be brothers

text: Talim yaparken yeri gelir kol kırılır
english: When you're training, it's the right thing to do.

text: Bu dediklerin olsa da bunları yapacak kişi sen değilsin
english: Even if that's what you're saying, you're not the one to do it.

text: Sen bey olarak emrini verir köşende izlersin
english: As a gentleman, you give your orders and you watch them in your corner.

text: Hata etmiş olsam da baş başa konuşabilirdik ana
english: Even if I'd made a mistake, we could've talked in private, mother.

text: Lakin abim herkesin içinde beni azarladı
english: But my brother scolded me in public
No one else listens to me.

text: Müsaadenle kardeşimle iki çift laf etmek isterim ana
english: If you'll excuse me, I'd like to have a word with my brother, Mother.
Don't forget that brother is your brother's home.
There is no refuge for you except from each other.

text: Dündar'ım böyle bir iş etmezdi Ne oldu bu oğlana böyle?
english: My Dündar wouldn't do such a job. What happened to this boy?
I know what it is, Mother.

text: De hele kızım Allah aşkına. Yüreğime inecek
english: And my daughter, for God's sake, she's going to break my heart.

text: Dündar Bey'im bir hatuna gönül vermiştir
english: Mr. Dündar had a crush on a girl
He didn't say anything to me either.
She's the Sunshine Girl from the Rye Bar.

text: Rabbim bu kızı bana boşuna sevdirmedi
english: My Lord didn't make me love this girl for nothing.
May God show you the best.

text: Ural'ın sağ kolu Acar Bey'in kızıdır
english: Ural's right-hand man is Mr. Acar's daughter.
If we hurt our father's memory
You held me hand in hand
You humiliated me in front of all those Alps.
With the courage of the court
If you treat the Alps with rage
It's up to me to remind you that you're a gentleman.

text: O Alplerin her biri ana kuzusudur
english: Every one of those Alps is a mama's boy.

text: Anaları, onları şehit olsunlar diye yetiştirdi
english: Their mother raised them to be martyrs.

text: Ben senden ne bellediysem onu bellettim
english: I've taught you what I've taught you.

text: Sen benim Alplere bir fiske vurduğumu ne vakit gördün?
english: When did you see me hit the Alps?
Get a hold of yourself, Dündar.
You're not in a state of mind.

text: Başka bir derdin vardır da bana mı demezsin?
english: Don't you have something else to worry about and tell me?
I'm bored in the room, brother.

text: Gayrı ben de cenk etmek, dövüşmek isterim
Yarın baskına sen de gelesin bizimle
english: You can come with us to the raid tomorrow.

text: Madem adam devirmeye bu kadar heveslisin
english: If you're so eager to take him down,

text: Görürüm ki her vakit ilimle meşgul olmaktasınız
english: I see you're always busy with knowledge.

text: ilim Müslüman'ın yitik malıdır Nerede bulsa gidip almalıdır
english: Knowledge is the loss of Muslims Wherever he finds it, he must go and get it
As Medina builds the Islamic State

text: Bütün vazifelerini büyük bir ehemmiyetle icra ederdi
english: He carried out all his duties with great care.

text: Lakin onun en önem verdiği vazifelerden biri
english: But it's one of his most important duties.

text: Efendimiz, ashab-ı suffa adı verilen genç talebeleriyle
english: My lord, with young disciples called the so-called "suffa."
He took care of it himself.

text: Daha sonra bu gençler, İslam Devleti'nin gelişmesinde
english: Later, these young people were in the development of the Islamic State.

text: cihana yayılmasında büyük pay sahibi oldular
english: They had a huge share in the spread of jihana.
To reach the range you imagine

text: sen de yanına liyakat sahibi insanlar almalısın
english: You should take some decent people with you.
You have to grow your Alps according to your demands.
You must build your fiefdom on justice.

text: Aksi takdirde kasırgalar diktiğin ağacı yok eder
english: Otherwise the hurricanes will destroy the tree you planted

text: Fidan köklerini öyle bir sal ki toprağa
english: Spread the sapling roots so far into the earth

text: senden sonra hiçbir fırtına dallarını incitemesin
english: No storm can hurt its branches after you.
May my Lord open my horizons
Keep the glory of being a gentleman
Do you have a sign, Mr. Acar?
Mr. Aliyar is going to raid with the Alps.

text: Niye benim haberim yok? Nereye gidiyorlar?
Bizim de yeni haberimiz oldu beyim
Nikea'dan kaleye giden bir kervanı basacaklar
english: They're going to raid a caravan from Nikea to the castle.

text: Tez var Ural Bey'e bu haberi ilet
english: There's a dissertation. Tell Mr. Ural about this.

text: Alpler obanın girişinde seni bekler beyim
english: The Alps are waiting for you at the entrance of the obas, sir.
Dogan, take care of Kutluca Oba
As a matter of fact, so is my sister.
May God help you. Thank you, sir.

text: Gazan mübarek olsun abi Dualarım seninle olacaktır
english: God bless you, brother. My prayers will be with you.

text: Beyim, dünden beridir emrettiğiniz gibi burada bekleriz
english: Sir, we'll wait here as you've ordered since yesterday.

text: Bu yoldan değil bir kervan bir atlı bile geçmedi
english: Not this way, not even a caravan passed by a horseman.
Salaam alaikum alaikum alaikum, Mr. Aliyar.

text: Kaleye bu güzergâhtan gideceklerine emin misin beyim?
english: Are you sure they'll take this route to the castle, sir?

text: Evvelsi gün komutanlarını öldürdükten sonra Vasilius korkmuştur
english: Vasilius was frightened after killing his commanders the day before yesterday.

text: Nikea'ya giden kervanına en güvendiği adamlarını
english: His most trusted men in his caravan to Nikea
You guys take your positions across the road.
When they arrive, we will strike first.
...and you do what you have to do.

text: Kırca, ardından gelen Alplere söyle tepelere çıksınlar
english: Ask the Alps to come up to the hills.
Let them expect orders from me.

text: Allah yardımcımız olsun beyim Âmin. Hepimizin
english: May God help us, Lord Amen, all of us.

text: Samsa, sen de yoldaki Alplere haber veresin
english: Samsa, you call the Alps on the road.

text: Beyim, hani adamın avucu kaşınır da altın gelecek derler ya beyim…
english: Sir, you know how they say the man's palm is itchy and the gold will come?

text: Zor zapt ederim kendilerini Kınlarında zor dururlar
english: I can hardly contain them. They can hardly stand in their scabbards.

text: Seni gören oldu mu? Hayır beyim
Çok mühim bir havadis olduğu için Acar Bey'im yolladı
english: Mr. Acar sent it because it's very important news.

text: Ertuğrul Bey, Aliyar Bey'le bir baskına gittiler
english: Ertugrul Bey went to a raid with Aliyar Bey
A caravan from Nikea will be raided.
Fine, you go back to the oba.
Keep your eyes and ears open.

text: Beylere de ki, Ural Bey yakında dönecekmiş de
english: Tell the gentlemen Mr. Ural will be back soon.
The Alps are on alert. Yes, sir.

text: Kaledeki mühimmat ve asker sayısını belirleyin
english: Set the number of ammunition and soldiers in the castle
How do you know about the caravan?
As he knows, so does Aliyar.

text: Kervanı basmak için ikisi de çoktan yola düşmüşler bile
english: They're both already on their way to hit the caravan.
I thought you'd like to know.

text: Hemen bir bölük asker hazırla Gidiyoruz
english: Prepare a troop of soldiers. We're leaving.

text: Tekfur Vasilius, bu bir tuzak olabilir Ölebilirsin
english: Tekfur Vasilius, this could be a trap You could die

text: O vakit de kale savunmasız kalır
english: Then the castle will be vulnerable.

text: Çabuk gidin ve bu baskına mani olun, çabuk
english: Go quickly and stop this raid, quickly

text: Gel hele, gel Bu sefer elimden kaçamayacaksın
english: Come here, come here You won't get away this time

text: Buradan hepinizin cesedi çıkacak, Ertuğrul Bey
english: You'll all be dead from here, Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Ya Rabbi, senin adını yüceltmek için…
english: O Lord, to praise thy name...
...help the braves who put their lives on the line.
Give them victory in the battlefield.

text: Onlara sevgili peygamberimizin savaşma hukukunu nasip et
english: Give them the law of our beloved prophet's fighting

text: Onların kılıcını Hazreti Ali'nin kılıcına say
english: Count their sword on the sword of the Lord Ali
As thou didst not leave thy people alone in Badr.
Don't leave those who follow in their footsteps alone.

text: Bu kutlu dava için canlarından vazgeçenlerin…
english: Those who gave their lives for this blessed cause...
We're putting your life in your hands.

text: Muhakkak ki sen emanetleri en iyi muhafaza edensin
english: You are the best keeper of trusts.
In the name of the great Prophet...

text: …dualarımızı dergâh-ı izzetinde kabul eyle ya Rabbim
english: Lord, accept our prayers in your presence.
I'll crush you like a little girl.
Brother, I've missed fighting with you.

Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey,
Move what you can, burn what you can't carry!
The traitor Alp has returned to Oba
We'll keep an eye on him.

text: Ertuğrul Bey ve Aliyar Bey geldiğinde ne olacağına karar verecekler
english: Mr. Ertugrul and Mr. Aliyar will decide what happens when they arrive.
She's the mother who's lost the order of the motif.

text: Hatun, üçlü sıralarda düğüm atasın Kurtayağını da kaçırmayasın
english: She'll tie a knot in a threesome and don't miss the wolf's foot.

text: Halime Hatun, Hayme Ana'ya motif mi götürürsün?
english: Halima Hatun, would you take the motif to Mother Hayme?

text: Sen zahmet etmeyesin Ver ben götüreyim
english: You don't have to bother. Give it to me. I'll take it to you.

text: Size de yardım etmek isterim Maksat işler hızlansın
english: I'd like to help you, too, to speed things up.

text: İşler hızlıdır, Günyeli Hatun Sen merak etmeyesin
english: Things are fast, Day Lady You don't have to worry

text: Senin de iznin olursa gül göbeği dokuyalım diyoruz
english: With your permission, we'd like to weave a rose belly.
We weave these around the edges.

text: …ana, motifin etrafına diken nakşetsek daha manalı olmaz mı?
english: ...wouldn't it make more sense if we embroidered a thorn around the motif?
How about a rose without thorns?

text: Lakin bu gülün dikenleri gizlidir Günyeli Hatun
english: But the thorns of this rose are hidden
If you want to see it, you'll see it.
That's why I didn't put a thorn in my motif.
Don't tell me you lost the ammunition.
Don't blame your commanders, your soldiers

text: Suçu olan biri varsa o da bu haberi Ertuğrul'a uçuran haindir
english: If anyone's guilty, it's the traitor who tipped off Ertugrul.

text: O haini bulup ellerimle öldüreceğim ellerimle
english: I will find that traitor and kill him with my bare hands.
Take a look at the one next door.
Keep an eye on the next of kin.

text: Aksi takdirde Ertuğrul daha çok zafer kazanır

english: Oh, thank God he's back, my lad.

Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey,
May Allah not separate their paths from their tracks.

text: Hoş geldiniz oğul Gazanız mübarek olsun
english: Welcome, son. Blessed be your wrath.

text: Hoş gördük ana. Allah razı olsun
Hoş geldin abi Fethiniz mübarek olsun
english: Welcome, brother. Blessed be your conquest.

text: Hoş bulduk bacım. Allah razı olsun
Beyim, verdiğiniz vazife çok şükür tamam oldu
english: Lord, thank God your duty is done.
I know who we're looking for.
The ammunition they collected to spill our blood...
...has been the spoils of our paradise.
God will increase us in strength.
Blessed be your victory, my lord!

text: İman dolu göğsümüzü zalim oklar mı delecek?
english: Will the cruel arrows pierce our faithful chest?
The path that Allah has set forth for His chosen servants.
...will he cut off the treacherous traps?
The jihad that trembles in the steps of the Turk...
...to save the oppressed in the hands of my oppressor...

text: …ve Allah'ın adaletini cihanın dört bucağına yaymaya ant içtik
english: ...and vow to spread God's justice to the ends of the jihad.

text: Türk ant içerse sözünü tutmadan ölmez
english: If the Turk takes an oath, he will not die without it.

text: Türk gözünü düşmana dikmişse zaferi görmeden ölmez
english: If the Turk stares at the enemy, he won't die before he sees victory.

text: Atamız Alpaslan pes etmedi Biz de pes etmeyeceğiz
english: Our ancestor, Alpaslan, has not given up, and we will not give up.

text: O, kılıcıyla doğudan batıya bir yol açtı
english: He opened a road from east to west with his sword

text: Bu yol bizim istikbalimizdir Ucu bucağı, nihayeti yoktur
english: This road is our future It's the end, it's the end

text: Nefesimiz yettiğince biz de o yoldan yürüyeceğiz
english: As long as we can breathe, we'll walk that way.

text: İlahi nizamı koruyup adaleti cihanın dört bir yerine yayacağız
english: We will maintain divine order and spread justice all over the jihad.

text: Gücünüz yetmez diyenlere inancımız yeter diyeceğiz
english: Those who say you can't afford it, we say we can have faith.

text: Aklınız yetmez diyenlere mücadelemiz yeter diyeceğiz
english: Those who say you can't think, we'll just have to fight.

text: Ömrünüz yetmez diyenlere tarihimiz yeter diyeceğiz
english: Those who say you don't have a life, we'll say we've got enough history.
To those who say you can't stay.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa! Aliyar Bey'im çok yaşa!
Bu dizinin betimlemesi Tekden Film tarafından
english: The depiction of this show by Odden Film
